overview:
Author of the BramList blog, Grant Bramlett provides a voice from the ‘Y’ Generation. Grant provides insights and reviews of current events, new technologies, social networking, and the military.

COO of theBlueWarrior.com, Grant manages user content and data for the first social network meant exclusively for the deployed military. As Supervisor for System operations, Grant ensures theBlueWarrior.com’s function and overall user capability.

US Army Officer, Grant Bramlett is a 1LT in the US Army Reserve. Having deployed to both the Iraq and Afghanistan theaters, Grant uses his experiences to provide content and relevance to the BramList blog and theBlueWarrior.com social networking site. Grant currently serves as the Deputy Secretary to General Staff for the 101st Airborne Division, Command Group.
